content.rendered:
Kids Corner Week 9

Come visit us for our last Kids Corner of the summer! Make sure to dress up in your pajamas for when we return “Home” from our long summer journey. Look out for some big giveaways!

  • Find Our Locations
  • View the Complete Kids Corner Schedule

Franchise Training

We’re in the middle of training our new franchisees! Stay tuned for photos and exciting announcements. Learn more about our franchising opportunity here.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Melissa & Doug Toys

Encourage color recognition, hand-eye coordination, fine motor development, and other basic life skills through fun and play!
